        <description>Called by Client Script WF_Repeat Callers Message</description>
        <name>WF_RepeatCallers</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WF_RepeatCallers = Class.create();
WF_RepeatCallers.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    isRepeatCaller: function() {
        const openedFor = this.getParameter('sysparm_opened_for');

        // Lookup active Requested Item for the Opened For with category 'repeat caller'
        const reqItem = new GlideAggregate('sc_req_item');
        reqItem.addQuery('cat_item.name', 'IT Service Desk Request');
        reqItem.addQuery('variables.20f56ed087b621905199c957cebb35cf', 'repeat_caller');
		reqItem.addQuery('requested_for', openedFor);
        reqItem.addQuery('active', true);
        reqItem.addAggregate('COUNT');
        reqItem.query();

        // Return CURRENT if an existing active record is found  
        if (reqItem.next() && reqItem.getAggregate('COUNT') > 0)
            return 'CURRENT';

        //Gets specified number of days and records from the system properties 
        const rpAmount = gs.getProperty('sn_sow_itsm_common.interaction.repeat_callers.amount');
        const rpTime = gs.getProperty('sn_sow_itsm_common.interaction.repeat_callers.days');
        const gDate = new GlideDateTime();
        gDate.addDaysLocalTime(-rpTime);
        const rpDate = gDate.getDate().toString();

        // Find all interactions created for the Opened For Person 
        // within the specified duration 
        const interaction = new GlideAggregate('interaction');
        interaction.addQuery('opened_for', openedFor);
        interaction.addQuery('opened_at', '>=', rpDate);
        interaction.addAggregate('COUNT');
        interaction.query();

        // Return NEW if a number records found within 
        if (interaction.next() && interaction.getAggregate('COUNT') >= rpAmount)
            return 'NEW';

        // Return NOT if the previous statements are false.
        return 'NOT';
    },

    type: 'WF_RepeatCallers'
});]]></script>
